subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Juan Martín del Potro clinched the last spot in the semifinals of the ATP finals, beating Roger Federer, 7-6 (3), 4-6, 6-3, in their final round-robin match.
snippet: Juan Martín del Potro clinched the last spot in the semifinals of the ATP finals, beating Roger Federer, 7-6 (3), 4-6, 6-3, in their final round-robin match.
